attributes.action: dismiss any cabinet member who has filed a fraudulent expenses claim
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All private companies undergo a disciplinary process for any memeber of staff who make a false expenses claim. The House of Parliment should be seen as no different. 
Members of the cabinet who allegedly make a false expenses claim should undergo a suspenson of their duties while a full investigation is undertaken.
If guilty they should undergo a disciplinary process. A false claim should be treated as fraud and hence a gross misconduct issue.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "dismiss any cabinet member who has filed a fraudulent expenses claim."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21276


Prime Minister's Office
